src_original: kāmaṃ tvak snāyu ca asthi cāvatiṣṭhatu pariśuṣyatu śarīrāṃ māṃsaśoṇitam* /
DbSū(2) 6 atha ca punar yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṃ sthāmavatā vīryavatā utsāhinā  dhṛḍhaparākrameṇa anikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tad bata nānuprāpyāntarā vīryasya  sraṃsanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
duḥkhaṃ kusīto viharati vyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṃkleśyaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ
sajvarair duḥkhavipākair āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyair mahataś cāpy arthasya pārihāṇir bhavati /
DbSū(2) 8 ārabdhavīryas tu sukhaṃ viharaty avyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ  sāṃkleśyaiḥ ponarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākair āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyair mahataś
